items.summary: Fix the evasive “No” button behavior in `frontend/index.html` so it always remains fully within the visible browser viewport (including after the first move), stays clickable, and continues to evade the cursor for up to 10 moves as intended.

Repair the hidden admin interface in `frontend/index.html` so logging in with username `akash` and password `2026edit` works, and the admin can update the BF name, GF name, and the main message as intended.

Update backend admin verification in `backend/main.mo` so admin-gated operations use the password `2026edit` (to match the required admin credentials) and ensure frontend admin checks that call `isAdmin(...)` succeed with `2026edit`.
